description:
From gravel to cross, or mountain to road, no matter how you get your 2-wheel fix, these SPD® pedals efficiently deliver your power to your tires. With their lightened spindle, the PD-M540 Help you save a few grams compared to the previous generation.

  • Compact body design
  • Open binding allows easy entry and mud shedding
  • Adjustable entry and tension release settings
  • CNC machined chromoly spindle
  • Sealed bearing cartridge axle
  • SM-SH51 single-release cleats included, also compatible with the SM-SH56 multi-release cleat (not included)
name: Shimano PD-M540 SPD Pedals
